extendedInfo.description: Exercise your brain, keep your mind healthy, refresh basic math skills, practice addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, improve your math skills, improve your concentration and memory skills, play Math Is Fun.To play Math is Fun simply select numbers from the screen and combine them to finish the equation shown above the numbers. If you select the right numbers, selected numbers will disappear from the screen. If you select the wrong numbers you will have to start over. You have 120 seconds to finish the game. Numbers left on the screen will reduce your final score.Math is Fun offers:- 3 different levels; easy, medium, hard- practice addition, subtraction, multiplication, division-  improve concentration and memory skills- simple design that looks great on all android devices and display sizes, including tablets- small size application size- fun for you, your kids, friends and relatives- perfect learning exercise - refresh basic math skills- takes 2 min to finish the game so perfect game for those who do not have much free time- kids love it and keeps them occupied for hours!Math is Fun is a math workout, mathematical exercise, brain puzzle game, brain exercise, IQ test, logic game, mental workout, mathematics game, brain teaser, educational puzzle,  for regular Joe, children or math genius. Math is Fun will help you to Improve your observation, focus, concentration and memory abilities. It will speed up your ability to perform calculations quickly.Math is Fun Is a perfect game for kids, children to play to learn basic mathematical skills or just become better at them, become math genius.Our mission at Classic Games is to bring the best classic, timeless games to Android devices, for free, with the best design, highest quality of professional programming, smallest size and much much more in order to ensure the best playing experience and endless hours of fun playing alone or with your friends, relatives and loved ones. Please send us an email telling us about games you miss playing, the ones you played for days when you were a kid and we will bring them back to life for your Android device.

reviews.title: Good

reviews.title: Excellent game

reviews.title: Not the best

reviews.title: I\'m stupid
reviews.comment: I forgot how to do basic math.  I need to learn again. Good app  to refresh.
